meanings.definition: A print made from a single plate coated with ink.
meanings.sent1: The artist proudly displayed his collection of monotints at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate monotints hanging on the walls of the museum.
meanings.sent3: The monotints on the wall seemed to tell a silent story of the artist's journey.
meanings.sent4: The monotints in the exhibit captured the essence of nature in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The monotints in the room added a touch of elegance to the space.

meanings.definition: A technique in which only one color is used in a painting or print.
meanings.sent1: The artist experimented with monotints to create a sense of harmony in her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The monotints in the collection showcased the artist's mastery of color blending.
meanings.sent3: Using only one color in the painting gave it a monotints charm that was captivating.
meanings.sent4: The monotints technique allowed the artist to convey depth and emotion with simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The monotints style of painting evoked a sense of calm and tranquility in the viewer.
